oldcomments.title: Template mapping made easy
oldcomments.author: haclong
oldcomments.body: Heyy !! since ZF2.3.x, you can now do this setup 'view_manager' => array( 'controller_map' => array( // new key in view_manager array 'Custom\Application' => true ), ), I haven't tested it yet but Alejandro find it in StackOverflow and in ZF2 Github repository
